item.title: recovering
item.description: Health Last saturday got my second b12 shot, and had long week in MX due Revolution Day (MÃ©xico) which I used to take some rest and recover. I am feeling better than last week. I can’t wait to go back to biking again. Con salud todo, sin ella nada. :-/
